name: Aztec Balls Minimal 2D For Android
description:
• The game

A game inspired by Aztec games where the player throws the balls with his hands in order to cross the circle and score points, with each level of score one star is presented and with three stars it is possible to advance the level.

  • Difficulty level

The game was designed to entertain the player without giving up to continue to the final level because of the difficulties encountered on the way, of course it will not be easy to win the trophy, but the end of this game is only for the champions.

Imagine having rocks on the way to hinder your victory, birds that appear to hinder and sometimes end up helping, grab the gems and increase the score.

The biggest challenge in this game is the countdown timer, either you set the level in the allowed time or you have to start over, the Aztecs won't like it.

  • Guaranteed fun

Ensure the fun of your friends, family and of course yours, show that you are able to reach the end of this journey, it's simple ball in the circle and dot.
